verses.verse: "Now<WH6258> muster<WH1413> yourselves in troops,<WH1413> daughter<WH1323> of troops;<WH1416> They have laid<WH7760> siege<WH4692> against<WH5921> us; With a rod<WH7626> they will smite<WH5221> the judge<WH8199> of Israel<WH3478> on the cheek.<WH3895>

"But as for you, Bethlehem<WH1035> Ephrathah,<WH672> [Too] little<WH6810> to be among the clans<WH505> of Judah,<WH3063> From you One will go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> for Me to be ruler<WH4910> in Israel.<WH3478> His goings<WH4163> forth<WH4163> are from long<WH6924> ago,<WH6924> From the days<WH3117> of eternity.<WH5769>"

Therefore,<WH3651> He will give<WH5414> them [up] until<WH5704> the time<WH6256> When she who is in labor<WH3205> has borne<WH3205> a child. Then the remainder<WH3499> of His brethren<WH251> Will return<WH7725> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And He will arise<WH5975> and shepherd<WH7462> [His flock] In the strength<WH5797> of the Lord,<WH3068> In the majesty<WH1347> of the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> His God.<WH430> And they will remain,<WH3427> Because<WH3588> at that time<WH6258> He will be great<WH1431> To the ends<WH657> of the earth.<WH776>

And this<WH2088> One<WH2088> will be [our] peace.<WH7965> When<WH3588> the Assyrian<WH804> invades<WH935> our land,<WH776> When<WH3588> he tramples<WH1869> on our citadels,<WH759> Then we will raise<WH6965> against<WH5921> him Seven<WH7651> shepherds<WH7462> and eight<WH8083> leaders<WH5257> of men.<WH120>

And they will shepherd<WH7462> the land<WH776> of Assyria<WH804> with the sword,<WH2719> The land<WH776> of Nimrod<WH5248> at its entrances;<WH6607> And He will deliver<WH5337> [us] from the Assyrian<WH804> When<WH3588> he attacks<WH935> our land<WH776> And when<WH3588> he tramples<WH1869> our territory.<WH1366>

Then the remnant<WH7611> of Jacob<WH3290> Will be among<WH7130> many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971> Like dew<WH2919> from the Lord,<WH3068> Like showers<WH7241> on vegetation<WH6212> Which<WH834> do not wait<WH6960> for man<WH376> Or delay<WH3176> for the sons<WH1121> of men.<WH120>

And the remnant<WH7611> of Jacob<WH3290> Will be among the nations,<WH1471> Among<WH7130> many<WH7227> peoples<WH5971> Like a lion<WH9030> among the beasts<WH929> of the forest,<WH9194> Like a young<WH3715> lion<WH3715> among flocks<WH5739> of sheep,<WH6629> Which,<WH834> if<WH518> he passes<WH5674> through,<WH5674> Tramples<WH7429> down<WH7429> and tears,<WH2963> And there<WH369> is none<WH369> to rescue.<WH5337>
Your hand<WH3027> will be lifted<WH7311> up against<WH5921> your adversaries,<WH6862> And all<WH3605> your enemies<WH340> will be cut<WH3772> off.<WH3772>
"And it will be in that day,<WH3117>" declares<WH5002> the Lord,<WH3068> "That I will cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> your horses<WH5483> from among<WH7130> you And destroy your chariots.<WH6>
"I will also cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> the cities<WH5892> of your land<WH776> And tear<WH2040> down<WH2040> all<WH3605> your fortifications.<WH4013>
"I will cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> sorceries<WH3785> from your hand,<WH3027> And you will have<WH1961> fortunetellers<WH6049> no<WH3808> more.

"I will cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> your carved<WH6456> images<WH6456> And your [sacred] pillars<WH4676> from among<WH7130> you, So that you will no<WH3808> longer<WH5750> bow<WH7812> down<WH7812> To the work<WH4639> of your hands.<WH3027>
"I will root<WH5428> out your Asherim<WH842> from among<WH7130> you And destroy<WH8045> your cities.<WH5892>
"And I will execute<WH6213> vengeance<WH5359> in anger<WH639> and wrath<WH2534> On the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> have not obeyed.<WH8085>"
